page_content: The page discusses the implementation of the Tacco & Flip project, focusing on movement and nutrition in Baselbieter schools.
The page provides an overview of teaching materials for primary and secondary education, including digital tools.
The page provides information on various legal forms of companies, registration procedures, and related guidelines.
The page provides instructions for participating in the 'Sport am Tag' challenge using a smartphone application.
The page discusses the management of the cantonal building and population registers, including the use of register software for data management.
The page focuses on the integration of ICT in educational settings, including the development of ICT support and infrastructure.
The page provides instructions for activating GPS on various smartphone models for participation in the 'Sport am Tag' challenge.
